title: The effect of COVID-19 anxiety on nurses' productivity determinants through perceived workload and individual job performance: A Bayesian mediation analysis

Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Maryam Rafiee, Tahereh Eskandari, Evan Abdulkareem Mahmood, Mojtaba Zokaei, Mohsen Falahati, Mohammad Hossein Khalilzadeh Naghneh
